noun.description: A native or inhabitant of Molossia in ancient Epirus.

adjective.description: Of or relating to Molossia in ancient Epirus.
Designating or relating to a breed of large dog resembling a mastiff, said to have originated in Molossia in ancient Epirus.

origin: Mid 16th century. From ancient Greek Μολοσσία, the name of a district in the centre of Epirus, a region of ancient Greece now forming part of north-western Greece and southern Albania + -an. Compare -ian.
